name: Allyrann and the Kingdom of Storia - Browser Demo
name_original: Allyrann and the Kingdom of Storia - Browser Demo
description:
Allyrann is a dragon-shifter - a half-dragon, half-human being, who can transform between a fully humanoid and more draconic appearance at will. She, and some friends, are enrolling in the kingdom of Storia's Noble Academy - but there's a more sinister reason they have for it than one would think at first glance.

Revenge.

Revenge for what, you may ask yourself? Each one of them - Allyrann, Codin, Shimmer and Mason - all have their reasons for either going along with the others', or desiring their own, revenge. But the question is whether they'll get it - and if they do, will it be worth it?

This preview introduces the main four characters, plus some side characters who will likely play a part in the full game. Many of the side characters will react differently depending on if you speak to them with Allyrann in her full-human or draconic form, but there's not a whole lot of story yet.
